channel.title: Elastic on Theo's lab
channel.description: Recent content in Elastic on Theo's lab

item.title: Nori Analyzer and Elk Stack
item.description: Recently, Elasticsearch announced its Korean analyzer nori. I decided test it using docker compose. Install Docker CE $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install \ apt-transport-https \ ca-certificates \ curl \ gnupg-agent \ software-properties-common $ curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - $ sudo add-apt-repository \ "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \ $(lsb_release -cs) \ stable" $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io $ sudo usermod -aG docker $USER Install Docker Compose $ sudo curl -L "https://github.
